title: Who was your Fantasy Sleeper Pick?
body: We're two weeks into the LCS Spring Split and things are just ramping up. Who has been your Fantasy sleeper pick so far? Did you go out on a limb for a player that has really payed off?

replies.body: fnatic was my sleeper pick, up their entire team. put bjergsen on the bench for them. worth.
Honest the gravity players I picked up Keane saint, cop and bunny rest of my league thought me a fool but look whose leading that ladder now you fools :D

> [{quoted}](name=its Harrell,realm=NA,application-id=0d2s1dEp,discussion-id=uePtlABx,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-02-04T08:30:25.320+0000)
>
> Honest the gravity players I picked up Keane saint, cop and bunny rest of my league thought me a fool but look whose leading that ladder now you fools :D

Gravity with the serious sleepers. They just snuck right up there to the top of the ladder. Nice pickups!
Definitely the winter Fox duo of Pobelter and Altec. My draft laughed when I picked them. I laughed when I took the easy wins.

> [{quoted}](name=Deadly Trash,realm=NA,application-id=0d2s1dEp,discussion-id=uePtlABx,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-02-03T01:36:29.498+0000)
>
> Definitely the winter Fox duo of Pobelter and Altec. My draft laughed when I picked them. I laughed when I took the easy wins.

Belter has been an all-star so far. Great pickup.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sweet,realm=NA,application-id=0d2s1dEp,discussion-id=uePtlABx,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-02-03T01:41:28.604+0000)
>
> Belter has been an all-star so far. Great pickup.

Yeah he has. I guess Best Zed NA is proving to be a worthy title.

Piglet.
Jk, love you.
Picked up febiven and huni after week 1. They got me 50 points each this week. I'm glad I picked them up.

Piglet is staying in my line-up forever BTW.
Freddy, Febiven, and Yellowstar. Ohh my god are these three doing work!
Was able to nab both Huni and Fanatic as a team after week 1.  Fanatic is absolutely crushing right now. :D
I picked up Febiven in one of the last rounds of the draft! I sure was glad I started him that week.
I picked up Febiven from free agency after Fnatic's first game. Him and Yellowstar have been gold for me.
Freddy has just been a god,

> [{quoted}](name=fetch3000rules,realm=NA,application-id=0d2s1dEp,discussion-id=uePtlABx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-03T01:15:23.213+0000)
>
> Freddy has just been a god,

I ended up adding Freddy this week to replace Quas for the time being. I hope he'll bounce back later.
I basically just went for broke on UoL lol. I also picked up Aphromoo, too bad skillshots hit % isn't worth anything :3

My hidden sleeper has been Cris, I was dumb enough not to start him week one, but now that I have, I haven't been disappointed yet.(Or YellowStar, undrafted free agent, gives me 56 points week 2... that's good enough for me)

> [{quoted}](name=Devilsfan30,realm=NA,application-id=0d2s1dEp,discussion-id=uePtlABx,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-03T01:32:43.023+0000)
>
> My hidden sleeper has been Cris, I was dumb enough not to start him week one, but now that I have, I haven't been disappointed yet.(Or YellowStar, undrafted free agent, gives me 56 points week 2... that's good enough for me)

YellowStar has definitely come out shining (heheh puns) this split.

My sleeper for the 1st week was Airwaks
And last week was Loulex
Fnatic + Rekkles p: couldn't get Yellowstar ]:
My Round 1 sleeper was the pick up on KEITHMC and boy did he deliver!!
All Fnatic players I picked up.
